ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Contains general data structures and functions for longitudinal data with multiple variables, repeated measurements, and irregularly spaced time points. Also implements a shrinkage estimator of dynamical correlation and dynamical covariance.

Contains general data structures and functions for longitudinal data with multiple variables, repeated measurements, and irregularly spaced time points. Also implements a shrinkage estimator of dynamical correlation and dynamical covariance.

name: r-longitudinal
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.1.13" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-longitudinal
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: longitudinal_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/longitudinal_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/longitudinal/longitudinal_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 57f04a0f387c1cc30d2feb945dc3ed35d2a304d94d21d3bc2cac8c92571fdc10

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 4
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-corpcor >=1.6.8
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-corpcor >=1.6.8

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('longitudinal')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('longitudinal')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://strimmerlab.org/software/longitudinal/
  license: GPL (>= 3)
  summary: Contains general data structures and functions for longitudinal data with multiple variables, repeated measurements, and irregularly spaced time points. Also implements a shrinkage estimator of dynamical correlation and dynamical covariance.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
